page.title: 19THE ROMAN CAMP CARAVAN SITE
page.content: In the Roman Camp area of Aylmerton and West Runton there are two{caravan {sites}set in woodland. The Roman Camp site covers about 2.5 hectares and is divided into{touring}caravans,{private static caravans, also shop, toilets, showers and a telephone. The site is open Easter to October - the main{holiday}period being July and August, as well as Spring Bank Holiday. There is accommodation during the season for seventy-four static caravans and various other tourers, they do not allow tents. The owners belong to the National Federation of Site Owners. Caravan holidays have changed in recent years, because people used to come for a roughly one-to-two night stay. Now, they cannot, because of the continual rising price of petrol, so now the stays are longer.
